data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Đồng Tháp, Vietnam. Please, stir the 35,459 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Đồng Tháp, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 35,459 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 46 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 35,459 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Đồng Tháp.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Gelao, Green people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Đồng Tháp to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, please defend the 35,459 believers in Đồng Tháp against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the state of Đồng Tháp, Vietnam has a population of 1,639,400.

We estimate Đồng Tháp has 35,459 people who might know Jesus, 131,500 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,472,441 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Đồng Tháp, Vietnam.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
